verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Rightiousness, Rightiousness,
is what I long for
Rightiousness is what I need
Rightiousness, Rightiousness
is what you want from me

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
So take my heart and form it
Take my mind and transform it
Take my will and conform it
To Yours, to Yours lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Holiness, Holiness,
is what I long for
Holiness is what i need
Holiness, Holiness
Is what you want from me

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Faithfulness, Faithfulness
is what I long for
Faithfulness is what i need
Faithfulness, Faithfulness
Is what you want from me
